starvationevasion.sim

Class AbstractClimateData

  • java.lang.Object
    • starvationevasion.sim.AbstractClimateData
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TileManager

    public abstract class AbstractClimateData
extends java.lang.Object
    The AbstractClimateData class should be extended by a class that holds the climate data used in Milestone II. In particular, this includes for all arable land areas on a 100 square kilometer resolution:
    1. Annual maximum temperature.
    2. Annual minimum temperature.
    3. Average annual daytime temperature.
    4. Average annual nighttime temperature.
    5. annual precipitation
    When extending this class, each development team may implement the getters as table lookups, map lookups, calculations based on lower resolution space and time data or whatever works.

    While the extending class must implement the abstract methods, a development team may also implement other methods that return the same data but with arguments that can access the data in the team's particular structures more efficiently.

      • getTemperatureMax

        public abstract float getTemperatureMax(float latitude,
                                        float longitude,
                                        int year)
        Gets the maximum temperature in the specified location during the specified year.
        Parameters:
        latitude - [-90.0 to 90.0], South latitudes are less than 0.
        longitude - [-180.0 to 180.0], West longitudes are less than 0.
        year - between AbstractScenario.START_YEAR and AbstractScenario.END_YEAR
        Returns:
        temperature in degrees Celsius.
